Nkhata Bay.title: Nkhata Bay
Nkhata Bay.byline: Nkhata Bay is a small, bustling fishing village of about 15,000 inhabitants, located about 50 kilometers from Mzuzu.

Nkhotakota.title: Nkhotakota
Nkhotakota.byline: Nkhotakota is a town in Central Malawi with a population of just over 20,000, on the shore of Lake Malawi.
